column4: Anyone using Brother MFC-7460DN printer on ubuntu - it's not working for me
was it working on previous ubuntu version?
I always had only this version of ubuntu
oh!
and it is 11.04 ...yes?
test page says it was sent to printer, but nothing appears on the printer
this apparenlty had happened with a previous user earlier to day with brother printer
was there any solution?
not that I recall...  he had downloaded the driver,, the system announced it was recogn ized but nothing happened
any other ideas I can try?
let me do a bit a research holdon
sure and thanks for help
is this 32 or 64 bit system?
32bit
it's AMD if that matters
did you loook here?   http://welcome.solutions.brother.com/bsc/public_s/id/linux/en/index.html
that's where I got the drivers
did you look through the how to install section?
and followed instructions from
ok then  I would suggest either or both  ##hardware or  ##linux channels.. maybe someone there has a solugion
thanks for help. I'll try there
